column5: heading on a fishing trip in northern quebec on may 15. never really fished specs or lakers. any tips for this time of year. type of tackle etc. thanks jnic
i am heading to sand lake, with air melancon. up around the clova area.

If your heading there with Air Melancon get Rick to sign you up onto Team #4.  My friend you are going to Paradise for trout.Lake trout on the surface with spoons.Cast slow retrieve.  Speckles just use a lake clear spoon attached to a trail hook 18 inches long #4 or #6 trout hooks tipped with a worm.Troll  3 inch Yozuri pin minnows slow retrieve.  Enjoy your trip.Dress warm its really cold up there in May.I have had snow in my boat May 24 weekend in that area.  Good luck we want to see huge trout Pics.  MTP

Unless there's another Sand Lake that air Melancon flies into, it's actually primarily a pike and walleye fishery along with some lakers (definitely no spec's).  Seems odd to be flying in on the 15th, 'cause at least in my part of N/W Quebec in the Rouyn Noranda area where my cabin is, Walleye and Pike opens on the 21st of May this year....

no thats the one. the back lake (adams lake) has specs. i was told by the outfitter  that pike and walleye open on the friday. it was the only week i could get holidays. so 3 days trout 3 days pike. thanks jnic p.s. have you heard how the fishing is at sand lake thanks jnic
